title: Please
description: She was given an ultimatum. Hiding behind a cell phone was not going to work for me anymore. Now I sit, at the diner and wait. Will my silver tongued little minx show? If she does, will she be as good with her mouth as she is with her fingers? -grins-. This book is erotic in nature. 18+. If sexual situations including oral, anal, masturbation, and role play make you uncomfortable do not purchase this book. This is the second in a series of three.
author: Jenna Thalia
